subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets banished Duaner Sánchez from camp Thursday for repeatedly showing up late to his morning workouts. He is scheduled to meet with Willie Randolph and  Omar Minaya on Saturday.
snippet: The Mets banished Duaner Sánchez from camp Thursday for repeatedly showing up late to his morning workouts. He is scheduled to meet with Willie Randolph and  Omar Minaya on Saturday.
